Package executor.service.service.step.impl

Class StepExecutionClickXpath

java.lang.Object
executor.service.service.step.AbstractStepExecution
executor.service.service.step.impl.StepExecutionClickXpath
All Implemented Interfaces:
StepExecution
public class StepExecutionClickXpath extends AbstractStepExecution
Concrete implementation of AbstractStepExecution for executing a step with a "Click XPath" action.

The StepExecutionClickXpath class extends the abstract base class AbstractStepExecution and provides a concrete implementation for executing steps with a "Click XPath" action. It encapsulates the logic required to interact with a web element using an XPath expression, typically resulting in a click action.

Instances of this class are intended to be used within a scenario execution context, where each step in a scenario is processed and executed based on its specified action and parameters.

The class includes logic for interpreting the step parameters, performing the "Click XPath" action using a WebDriver, and handling any exceptions that may occur during the execution. It follows the template pattern defined in the AbstractStepExecution class, allowing for customization and extension of the execution process in subclasses.

Implementers may further customize the behavior of this class by providing additional functionality in overridden methods or by adding new methods.

  • Method Details

    • getStepAction

      public String getStepAction()
      Gets the action identifier associated with this step execution.

      The getStepAction method overrides the corresponding method in the AbstractStepExecution class. It specifically returns the action identifier CLICK_XPATH_ACTION, indicating that this step execution is designed to handle steps with a "Click XPath" action. The action identifier is typically used for matching and identifying step executions within a scenario execution context.

      Implementers of this method should ensure that the returned action identifier matches the action type specified in the corresponding scenario step to enable proper matching and execution during scenario processing.

      Returns:
      The action identifier associated with this step execution (e.g., CLICK_XPATH_ACTION).
      See Also:
      • AbstractStepExecution

    • executeStepLogic

      protected void executeStepLogic(org.openqa.selenium.WebDriver webDriver, Step step)
      Executes the logic for the "Click XPath" action step.

      The executeStepLogic method overrides the corresponding method in the AbstractStepExecution class. It is responsible for interpreting and executing the logic specific to the "Click XPath" action step. The method receives a WebDriver instance and a Step object, where the step's value represents the XPath expression identifying the web element to be clicked.

      The implementation locates the web element using the provided XPath expression and performs a click action using the WebDriver.

      Implementers should customize this method to handle the specifics of executing the "Click XPath" action based on the requirements of their application.

      Specified by:
      executeStepLogic in class AbstractStepExecution
      Parameters:
      webDriver - The WebDriver instance for interacting with the web application.
      step - The Step object representing the scenario step with a "Click XPath" action.
      See Also:
      • AbstractStepExecution
      • WebDriver
      • Step
